content.text:
# Communist Revolution Movement/Leninist (Turkey)

KDH/L symbolCommunist Revolution Movement/Leninist () is a clandestine communist organization in Turkey. KDH/L was founded in 1999, following a split from the Communist Revolution Movement (KDH). KDH/L accused KDH of opportunism.
KDH/L publishes Proleter Devrimci KöZ.
The legal front of KDH/L is the Revolutionary Party Forces/Leninist ().
External links
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20111012081210/http://www.solyayin.com/yayin/leninist-isik Leninist Light - Periodical of KDH/L]

*[https://web.archive.org/web/20050907041643/http://www.kozonline.org/ Proleter Devrimci KöZ]
